about_the_game:
After crash landing on a strange planet, Kiren finds himself in a realm of darkness, giant bugs, and a tribe of warriors who can see in the dark.

  • Play as Kiren, a cadet from the crashed ship Apollyon. Place towers to keep the endless hordes of bugs at bay!
  • Play as Aelita, a tribe warrior with augmented vision. Pick up weapons and summon the help of other warriors to fight alongside Kiren's towers!

short_description: A cooperative action tower defense and third-person shooter where vision is mutually exclusive. Place towers to shine light on the endless horde of bugs, or use augmented vision to fight alongside defenses. Equip powerful modules that unleash your strategy's true potential!
